The Lord of the Rings Online

wikitext.*:
'''North Ithilien''' was the northern part of [[Ithilien]] between the [[Anduin]] and the [[Ephel Dúath]] and was somewhat less extensive than its southern counterpart, [[South Ithilien]] (lower Ithilien). The refuge of [[Henneth Annûn]]<ref>{{RK|Map}}</ref> and the [[Field of Cormallen]]<ref>{{RK|VI4}}</ref> were to be found in this part of Ithilien.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Ithilien (North) map.jpg|thumb|300px|Map of South Ithilien in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''2016: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:North Ithilien is chronologically set after the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]], with the [[Army of the West|Host of the West]] marching towards the [[Black Gate]]. The ranger strongholds ''Bâr Aroth'' and ''Bâr Tarnaher'' are similarly overrun, while ''Aelin Veren'' was only briefly passed by and has since been reclaimed from the Enemy. The secrecy of [[Henneth Annûn]] has been abandoned, as it is used to support the Host of the West during its march and would serve no further purpose should its mission fail.
